sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_875316_filmcity.MomentJsFuncs</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>MomentJsFuncs</name><script><![CDATA[gs.include('moment.min.js');
gs.include('moment-timezone-with-data-1970-2030');

var MomentJsFuncs = Class.create();
MomentJsFuncs.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    timeToDiffTZ: function() {
        gs.info(moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss a'))
        var a = moment.tz(new GlideDateTime().getValue(), 'GMT') //.format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss z')
        var b = a.clone().tz("America/New_York").format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss z')
		return b;
    },
    type: 'MomentJsFuncs'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-07 05:55:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>1cb81acf97e28610f99bfcdfe153af86</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MomentJsFuncs</sys_name><sys_package display_value="FilmCity" source="x_875316_filmcity">93756e7e97873110f99bfcdfe153af0f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="FilmCity">93756e7e97873110f99bfcdfe153af0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1cb81acf97e28610f99bfcdfe153af86</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-07 05:55:49</sys_updated_on><u_iscreatedbyme>true</u_iscreatedbyme></sys_script_include></record_update>
